===Models=== *[[TP-LINK TL-XAP6030GI]] (-PoE/DC) • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, MT7975N/FEM, MT7975PN/FEM • [https://www.acwifi.net/23656.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XAP5400GI]] (-PoE/DC) • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB *[[TP-LINK TL-XAP3020GC]] (-PoE/DC) • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB *[[TP-LINK TL-XAP3007GC]] (-PoE/DC) • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB
:;[[TP-LINK]] • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_list_wifi6.html Wi-Fi 6 Models] • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_list_triband.html Tri-Band Models] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR1850]] (AX1800) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1685.html PPage] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR1860]] (AX1800) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1637.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/9417.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR3020]] (AX3000) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1494.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/8094.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR3020 v2]] (AX3000) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_2419.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/19837.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR3230]] (AX3200) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1751.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/11414.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR5430]] (AX5400) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1728.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/10879.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6020]] (AX6000) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_2246.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/18464.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6030]] (AX6000) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1702.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/10438.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6060]] (AX6000) • [https://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_1622.html PPage] • [https://www.acwifi.net/9412.html AC|WiFi]
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.acwifi.net/23656.html ''TP-LINK TL-XAP6030GI (Filogic 830)'' Review on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986BLA @1.6GHz (Quad Core) ''[https://www.MediaTek.com/products/home-networking/MediaTek-filogic-830 Filogic 830]'' :Flash: XMC 25QH128CHIQ-12 (16MB); PCB ID: 2053501261 :RAM: [[MediaTek]] MT7986BLA (512MB) WiSoC; [https://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/DSC_3887.jpg PCB images] :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986BLA/MT7975N/MT7975PN 2.4/5GHz <!-- (RFIC/FEM) *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A/B @2.0/1.6GHz (4 cores) • ''Filogic 830'' :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A @2.0GHz (''Filogic 830'') • [https://www.acwifi.net/19656.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) <!-- :MT7986A(V) @2.0GHz (DDR3/DDR4), MT7986B(V/LA) @1.6GHz (DDR3) *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7981A/B @1.8/1.3GHz (2 cores) • ''Filogic 820''
*MediaTek Filogic 830 is a high-performance, premium wireless networking SoC designed for routers, repeaters, access points and mesh :networking devices. Built using a highly power-efficient 12nm process, the chip features a powerful quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU, :integrated multi-band 4×4 Wi-Fi 6/6E, twin 2.5GbE interfaces, hardware-based networking accelerators and complete Wi-Fi Alliance :Wi-Fi 6 Release 2 feature support. Specifically, it’s integrated dual Wi-Fi 6 baseband supports up to 1024QAM, 24 user OFDMA, BW160 :and 8 spatial streams (SS). --> *[https://www.acwifi.net/18464.html ''TP-LINK TL-XDR6020 (AX6000)'' Review on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN)

*[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6000]] • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, MT7975N/FEM, MT7975PN/FEM • [https://www.acwifi.net/21862.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6010]] • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, MT7975N/FEM, MT7975PN/FEM • [https://www.acwifi.net/21862.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6020]] • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, MT7975N/FEM, MT7975PN/FEM • [https://www.acwifi.net/18464.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6050]] • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, 4x @1.6GHz, 16/512MB :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986B, MT7975N/FEM, MT7975PN/FEM • [https://www.acwifi.net/21385.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6086]] • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A, 4x @2.0GHz, 128/512MB :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A, MT7976GN/VC5333-21, MT7976AN/QPF4588 • [https://www.acwifi.net/21922.html AC|WiFi] *[[TP-LINK TL-XDR6088]] • CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A, 4x @2.0GHz, 128/512MB :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A, MT7976GN/VC5333-21, MT7976AN/QPF4588 • [https://www.acwifi.net/20864.html AC|WiFi]
